remarks: Commutative/associative law for Hilbert space operator sum that swaps the first two terms.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Aug-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hods.1 $e |- R : ~H --> ~H $.
hods.2 $e |- S : ~H --> ~H $.
hods.3 $e |- T : ~H --> ~H $.
hoadd12i $p |- ( R +op ( S +op T ) ) = ( S +op ( R +op T ) ) $.
